A001.guidance_cds:
- Enter the reference number of the Certificate of authenticity for fresh 'EMPEROR' table grapes.

- Where a sequentially numbered range of certificates covers the goods, enter the lowest to the highest reference numbers of the certificates concerned, e.g. document code + 0054037-0054047: status code.

- Where certificates are not sequentially numbered, enter the reference number of each certificate concerned.

- Use the following [document status code](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-trade-tariff-document-status-codes-for-harmonised-declarations/uk-trade-tariff-document-status-codes-for-harmonised-declarations): <abbr title='Document attached for certification by customs'>AC</abbr>

A007.guidance_cds:
- Enter the reference number of the Certificate of authenticity for frozen beef and veal (crop, chuck and blade and brisket cuts).

- Where a sequentially numbered range of certificates covers the goods, enter the lowest to the highest reference numbers of the certificates concerned, e.g. document code + 0054037-0054047: status code.

- Where certificates are not sequentially numbered, enter the reference number of each certificate concerned.

- Use one of the following [document status codes](https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/uk-trade-tariff-document-status-codes-for-harmonised-declarations/uk-trade-tariff-document-status-codes-for-harmonised-declarations): <abbr title='Document attached - exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry (document returned to the trader)'>AE</abbr>, <abbr title='Document attached - exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry (document returned to the relevant Department)'>AF</abbr>, <abbr title='Document attached - exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry (document retained)'>AG</abbr>, <abbr title='Document attached - part use (applies to this and other entries) (document returned to the trader)'>AP</abbr>, <abbr title='Document attached - surrendered (document returned to the trader)'>AS</abbr>, <abbr title='Document attached - surrendered (document returned to the relevant department)'>AT</abbr>, <abbr title='Document with the goods - exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry'>GE</abbr>, <abbr title='Document with the goods - part use (applies to this and other entries)'>GP</abbr>, <abbr title='Document held by authorised trader - exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry'>JE</abbr>, <abbr title='Evidence required is available from trader - part use (applies to this and other entries)'>JP</abbr>, <abbr title='Lodged previously - exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry'>LE</abbr>, <abbr title='Lodged previously - part use (applies to this and other entries)'>LP</abbr>, <abbr title='Paper (held by trader) unavailable - already attributed on simplified declaration'>UA</abbr>, <abbr title='Paper (held by trader) unavailable - exhausted by (or only applies to) this entry'>UE</abbr>, <abbr title='Evidence required is unavailable - part use (applies to this and other entries)'>UP</abbr>, <abbr title='Paper (held by trader) unavailable - surrendered'>US</abbr>, <abbr title='Document not required - quantity below de minimis'>XB</abbr>

9RCP.guidance_cds:
- Enter the RPA recipe number.

- No document status code is required.
